name: East Canada Paper Sap Hands-on-Project
description: SAP Hands-on Project for Coursera's SAP Technology Consultant Course. The project served as a comprehensive, hands-on experience simulating a real-world SAP implementation using the Activate methodology's six stages: Discovery, Planning, Explore, Realize, Deploy, Test & Run.
body: SAP Hands-on Project for Coursera's SAP Technology Consultant Course. The project served as a comprehensive, hands-on experience simulating a real-world SAP implementation using the Activate methodology's six stages: Discovery, Planning, Explore, Realize, Deploy, Test & Run. Throughout this course, I Gained practical experience with the entire SAP implementation lifecycle using the Activate methodology.Developed critical skills in project management, stakeholder communication, and technical solution design. Demonstrated the ability to translate business needs into a functional SAP solution.
